SummaryEnglish: Yi Feng traveled to the immortal river continent, due to the birth of no spiritual root, can only rely on the system gift of the "essential skills of life" barely live. Unbeknownst to him, in the eyes of those practitioners, his strength is already a god-level existence, and his every move affects the entire pattern of the Xianjiang Continent. Yi Feng unknowingly and gently solves many crises, but also brings a lot of hot blooded and hilarious scenes, bringing new opportunities and choices for people living in this continent.
